name: Bundelo La Noche Belicoso
additionalNotes: La Noche cigars are aged for 5 years and are a blend of Honduran, Nicaraguan, Dominican and Costa Rican tobaccos.  La Noche cigars are medium bodied.  Indonesian wrapper and Sumatra binder.  La Noche cigars are a mix of long and short fill tobacco's from the Bucanero cigar line.
